articles.author: Jacek Krywko
articles.title: A neural brain implant provides near instantaneous speech - Ars Technica
articles.description: Focusing on sound production instead of word choice makes for a flexible system.

articles.author: Isabel Wang
articles.title: Tech stocks are powering this record-setting rally on Wall Street — but how long can it last? - MarketWatch
articles.description: The rally off April’s lows shows ‘real strength’ in growth parts of the market — but also bear-market and counter-trend moves in others, says one strategist
